! "<<lingo Name>>" framework

<<lingo Description>>

[[Forum thread - Any gamification plugin?|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/any-gamification-plugin/7894/2]]

!! Usage

# Open the layout
#* Use the layout switcher button {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} on the PageControl to switch the layout
#* Use the shortcut button {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} on the PageControl to switch to the layout provided by the plugin.
# Fill in the required information, e.g. the default tag for todo tasks (this is only required for the first time)
# Currently it will open a [[default game shipped with the plugin|$:/plugins/linonetwo/scp-foundation-site-director]] (more comes in the future as sub-plugin)
#* Follow the game tutorial and complete the game character creation
#* Follow the in-game tutorial and return to the knowledge base to do things that generate rewards, then return to the game to receive rewards based on the tutorial
#* Use rewards to grow your business in the game and earn more in-game rewards
#* Excess in-game rewards can be redeemed in the store system to reward yourself and motivate you.
#* Keep your promise to yourself, don't cheat and deceive yourself, the only consequence of cheating is that it reduces the effect of the game to motivate you!
# Close the layout and switch back to the default story flow layout
#* Use the layout switcher button {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} on the PageControl to switch the layout, can use shortcut key `Ctrl+Shift+L` to open it
#* Use the shortcut button {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} on the PageControl again, click on it again can switch back and forth between the imessage layout and the The default layout.

!! Developing

See [[Official wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/]].

! 「<<lingo Name>>」框架

<<lingo Description>>

[[中文论坛 - 设计人生游戏化的插件讨论|https://talk.tidgi.fun/topic/110]]

!! 用法

# 打开布局
#* 使用页面工具栏上的布局切换器按钮 {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} 切换布局
#* 使用页面工具栏上，本插件增加的快捷按钮 {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} 切换到本插件提供的布局
# 根据提示填写所需信息，例如待办任务所用的标签（仅初次使用时需要这么做）
# 目前将会打开[[默认自带的一个游戏|$:/plugins/linonetwo/scp-foundation-site-director]]（更多游戏未来将以子插件的形式分发）
#* 跟随游戏引导，完成游戏角色创建
#* 跟随游戏教程，回到知识库里做一些事情，产生奖励，然后回到游戏根据教程接收奖励
#* 使用奖励在游戏中经营发展，获得更多游戏内奖励
#* 多余的游戏奖励可以在商店系统中兑换为对自己的奖励，激励自己
#* 要遵守和自己的约定，可别作弊欺骗自己哦，作弊唯一的后果就是减少了这个游戏激励你自己的效果
# 关闭布局，切换回默认卡片流布局
#* 使用页面工具栏上的布局切换器按钮 {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} 切换布局，可以使用快捷键 Ctrl+Shift+L 打开它
#* 再次使用页面工具栏上，本插件增加的快捷按钮 {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} 点击它可以在本插件提供的布局和默认布局之间来回切换

!! 开发

请参阅[[官方知识库|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/]]。

o/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/SmallPunishment/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/SmallPunishment/Caption","text":"小惩罚"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/LargePunishment/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/LargePunishment/Caption","text":"大惩罚"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/Item/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/EventType/Item/Caption","text":"物品"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/Caption","text":"可交易资源"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/Description","text":"允许跨位面兑换的资源，根据开发者填写的兑换比例，可以在不同的游戏子插件中兑换。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/DocsLink":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/Exchangeable/DocsLink","text":"详见[[框架文档|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/#ExchangeableResources]]上的[[开发文档|ExchangeableResources]]。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/Caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/Caption","text":"现实事件类型"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/Description","text":"由现实世界的有意义的行动触发的事件，包含多种类型，描述了它们对玩家现实世界人生的意义大小，也描述了将获得的游戏内的奖励大小。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/DocsLink":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/zh-Hans/RealityEventType/DocsLink","text":"详见[[框架文档|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/#RealityEvents]]上的[[开发文档|RealityEvents]]。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/ /core/macros/lingo","tags":"$:/tags/Global","text":"<!-- //TODO: remove after https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/pull/7821 is merged -->
<!-- Note that lingo-base should end with a trailing slash character -->
\procedure lingo-base()
$:/language/
\end lingo-base

\procedure lingo(title,override-lingo-base)
<!-- Lingo procedure -->
<!-- Get the parse mode used to invoke this procedure -->
\whitespace trim
<$parameters $parseMode="parseMode">
	<!-- Compute the lingo-base-->
	<$let active-lingo-base={{{ [<override-lingo-base>!match[]else<lingo-base>] }}}>
		<!-- First try the old school <active-lingo-base><title> format -->
		<$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>>
			<!-- If that didn't work, try the new <lingo-base><langcode>/<title> format -->
			<$let language-code={{{  [[$:/language]get[text]get[name]else[en-GB]] }}}>
        <$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<language-code>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>/>
			</$let>
		</$transclude>
	</$let>
</$parameters>
\end lingo"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/

<<lingo Readme>>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/reality-event-cache/cache-files/desktop":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/reality-event-cache/cache-files/desktop","type":"application/json","tags":"$:/Tags/Gamification/RealityEventCache","code-body":"yes","text":"[]"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/reality-event-cache/cache-files/mobile":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/reality-event-cache/cache-files/mobile","type":"application/json","tags":"$:/Tags/Gamification/RealityEventCache","code-body":"yes","text":"[]"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/reality-event-cache/keys/Readme.tid":{"text":"这对公私钥通过 `ssh-keygen` 生成：

```sh
ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "linonetwo012@gmail.com" -f src/tw-gamification/keys/linonetwo-key
```

它们用于模拟网游环境中服务器签发可验证凭证的场景，掌管事件生成的服务端会对验证过的数据进行签名，客户端通过服务器的公钥验证生成的事件的有效性。

游戏会将使用过的数据的时间戳存放在存档文件中，相当于通过黑名单机制销毁了使用过的可验证凭证。一周时间后，时间戳会从黑名单中去除，同时游戏也会忽略时间超过一周没使用的可验证凭证，通过这种方式保证黑名单不会过度增长，同时又保证可验证凭证不会被双花。

这主要是实验性的，因为目前私钥也放在客户端，攻击者想签发可验证凭证很简单，所以主要是一个概念验证。

  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GameLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GameLayout","name":"<<lingo Name $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/>>","icon":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GameLayoutImage","description":"<<lingo Description $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/>>","tags":"$:/tags/Layout","text":"\whitespace trim
\import [subfilter{$:/core/config/GlobalImportFilter}]
\define containerClasses()
tc-page-container tc-language-$(languageTitle)$ tw-gamification-container
\end
\procedure redirected-navigate-actions()
  <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="" $timestamp="no" />
	<$action-navigate $to=<<event-navigateTo>> $scroll="yes" />
\end

<$vars
	storyviewTitle={{$:/view}}
	languageTitle={{{ [{$:/language}get[name]] }}}
	isDefaultEventGeneratorEnabled={{{ [{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/configs/EnableDefaultEventGenerator}match[yes]] }}}
	isDefaultEventGeneratorLackConfig={{{ [{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/configs/DefaultEventGeneratorTagsForTask}match[]] :then[[yes]] }}}
>
	<div class=<<containerClasses>>>
		<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}>
			<$messagecatcher $tm-navigate=<<redirected-navigate-actions>>>
				{{$:/core/ui/CommandPaletteTemplate}}
				{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GameStory}}
			</$messagecatcher>
		</$navigator>
	</div>
</$vars>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GameStory":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/GameStory","text":"\whitespace trim

<$GameWikiProvider>

  <$transclude $variable={{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/configs/DefaultGame}} />

</$GameWikiProvider>
"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/PageLayout/style.css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<% if [{$:/layout}match[$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/PageLayout/GameLayout]] %>

/* Game is full-screen, but there is a strange padding below page, cause scrollbar shown. We remove the scrollbar. */
.tc-body {
  overflow-y: hidden;
}

<% endif %>

.tw-gamification-single-text-tag-editor-setting-tags-item input {
  margin-left: 5px;
  padding: 2px;
} 

.tw-gamification-container {
  height: 100%;
}
.tw-gamification-container > p {
  margin: 0;
}

.tw-gamification-main-area {
  /** minus the tw-gamification-page-control-below-page height */
  height: calc(100vh - 45px);
  /** move input to bottom, and let chat near it */
  justify-content: flex-end;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.tw-gamification-config-before-use {
  padding: 3rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
.tw-gamification-config-before-use .tc-edit-add-tag {
  margin: 20px 0;
}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/functions/count-reality-events":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/functions/count-reality-events","tags":"$:/tags/Global","text":"<!-- //TODO: only count by types provided in param -->
<!-- Show how many rewards are there in the event log cache -->

\define event-generator-list-item()
  \define checkactions()
    <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>/>
  \end checkactions

  <div class="list-item">
    <$checkbox
      tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>
      field="enabled"
      checked="yes"
      unchecked="no"
      checkactions=<<checkactions>>
    >
      <span class="item-title">
        <!-- if icon field is a tiddler title, transclude it, if it is an emoji, display it -->
        <$transclude $tiddler={{!!icon}}>
          <$fill $name="ts-missing">
            <$transclude $field="icon"/>
          </$fill>
        </$transclude>
        <$transclude $field="caption" mode="inline" />
      </span>
      <span class="item-description">
        <$transclude $field="description" mode="inline" />
      </span>
    </$checkbox>
  </div>
\end event-generator-list-item

<<lingo Configs/EventGenerators/Description>>

<div class="tw-gamification-event-generator-list">
  <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/Tags/Gamification/ChangeFilter]!is[draft]]">
    <<event-generator-list-item>>
  </$list>
</div>
